Html:
I can't tell you how awesome this project is. I have immense praise for it.
However, where are the authors for patches.updates and changes? What's the status of this project?

It seems like the issues, patches and discussions are piling up without notice from contributors. It would be nice if the authors opened up the project a little. I will happily contributing patches and fix bugs if I knew there was a chance of integration, but there hasn't been any word from authors in a long while.

Maybe someone else has information about this.

I personally would like a handful of changes:
  • Upgrade to 3.5 and generics
  • Fix of some various known bugs
  • Fizzler integration (http://code.google.com/p/fizzler/)
  • HtmlDoc to XDoc converter
Regards,
CV
Sure, if it helps to move this project along.

Yay! Glad to hear it Simon!

Do you have any plans for HtmlAgilityPack in the future?

I would be interested in contributing or helping with rolling in patches/upgrades?

It's kinda perfect as-as, but some small changes would make it even more perfect :)
